summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 2085, entitled "An Ordinance providing the manner in which the local improvement designated in Subdivision one (1) of Section seven (7) of Article eight (8) of the Charter of the City of Seattle, as amended and now in force may be made, and the manner in which special assessments therefor may be levied and collected on property benefited thereby and the mode of paying for the same", approved April 29, 1892, and Ordinance No. 3475, approved August 8, 1894, amendatory thereof.
